Term Assurance Plan is designed for the policyholder toenjoy receiving a cost effective benefits. Under this Plan, the sum assured will be paid in case of any unforeseen death during the term of the policy. This could be extended with the following living benefits that can be added separately, depending on the need of the policyholder

Accidental Death Benefit,Total & Permanent Disability Benefit,Partial & Permanent Disability Benefit,Critical Illness Benefit,Funeral Expenses Benefit,Family Income Benefit,Spouse Cover Benefit,Critical Illness Benefit on the Life of Spouse,Child Critical Illness Benefit,Waiver of Premium Benefit,Hospitalization per Day Benefit,Health Care Benefit,Super Health Care Benefit Are some Benifits
